content.text: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie" )

content.text: 1 (21 ounce) can apple pie filling
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 (21 ounce) can apple pie filling" )

content.text: 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon" )

content.text: 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg" )

content.text: 1 teaspoon lemon zest
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 teaspoon lemon zest" )

content.text: 1 egg
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 egg" )

content.text: 1/3 cup white sugar
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1/3 cup white sugar" )

content.text: 1 tablespoon lemon juice
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 tablespoon lemon juice" )

content.text: 3 ounces cream cheese
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "3 ounces cream cheese" )

content.text: 1/4 cup sour cream
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1/4 cup sour cream" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "425 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "220 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Roll out pastry shell and allow to rest in refrigerator.
2) Line a 9 inch pie pan with one rolled out pastry crust.
3) In a medium mixing bowl combine pie filling, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon rind.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "combine"@27:34 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "pie filling"@35:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "cinnamon"@48:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "nutmeg"@58:64 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "lemon rind"@70:80 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a medium mixing bowl"@6:26 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Stir until fully combined and spread into pastry lined pan.
5) In a small mixer bowl combine egg, sugar, lemon juice, cream cheese, and sour cream.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "combine"@25:32 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "egg"@33:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "sugar"@38:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "lemon juice"@45:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "cream cheese"@58:70 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "sour cream"@76:86 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a small mixer bowl"@6:24 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Beat at medium speed until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Beat"@3:7 / AC
		:mnr ( "medium speed"@11:23 / OTHER )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until smooth"@24:36 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Spread cheese mixture over apple mixture, and place top crust over filling.
8) Seal edges, cut some steam vents in top crust, and sprinkle top with sugar.
9) Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-9-0 "preheated oven"@12:26 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "25 to 30 minutes"@31:47 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-9-0 "until golden brown"@49:67 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Cool completely before serving.
